1428330.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Coastlines Map Pack
1428330.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Coastlines Map Pack

The Coastlines Map Pack features hand-drawn images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This art package allows the expanse into coastal regions and water-oriented locations and works seamlessly with all other SmiteWorks hand-drawn map packages.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Water base background image and 4 premade maps (Lighthouse Interiors, Lighthouse Island, Ocean Caves, and a Ship at Sea)
  • brushes (sandy shores, docks, and coastal waves)
  • 50 decorations to add to maps, including sand dunes, waves, nautical items, and more
    effects for water turbulence
  • tiles for creating rocky coasts, docks, and ships
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough[/b]
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
